# shuffled()

**Instance Method**

Returns a new array that lists this array’s elements in a random order.

## Declaration

```swift
func shuffled() -> [Any]
```

## Return Value

A new array that lists this array’s elements in a random order.

## Discussion

Calling this method is equivalent to calling the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/shuffled(using:)] method and passing the system [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameplayKit/GKRandomSource/sharedRandom()] random source. To influence the random shuffling or to be able to deterministically reproduce a series of shuffles, create your own [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameplayKit/GKRandomSource] object.

## Randomly Shuffling an Array

- **shuffled(using:)**: Returns a new array that lists this array’s elements in a random order, using the specified random source.
